org.thormor.vault
Class CLinkedVault

java.lang.Object
  org.thormor.vault.CLinkedVault

public class CLinkedVault
extends java.lang.Object

A linked vault represents a thormor vault which the library user can poll for updates, or post messages for the owner of the linked vault.

Method Summary

          A local name to refer to this linked vault.

readLocalInbox

public JSONObject readLocalInbox()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Returns:
